channel.title: Blogs on Ondřej Čertík
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ondřej Čertík

item.title: Enabling Blog At My Webpage
item.description: My webpage is generated using Hugo and it uses the hugo-resume template. I just enabled a blog section here, so that I can post blog posts here from now on. My old blog is still hosted at https://ondrejcertik.blogspot.com/, but I do not update it anymore.
